sentences.en: Juventus are eyeing Italy U 21 pair Andrea Coda and Daniele Dessena.
sentences.cn: 尤文图斯正在关注意大利U21双星安德烈亚·柯达和丹尼尔·德塞拉.

sentences.en: The coda to this last movement is borrowed from two humanists.
sentences.cn: 这个最后乐章的完结部是引用两个人道主义者的话.

sentences.en: The final two months were a miserable coda to the President's first period in office.
sentences.cn: 总统首届任期的最后两个月非常糟糕。

sentences.en: Turn over first to see the phrase beginning and coda part before starting use the phrase.
sentences.cn: 在开始使用词典之前,先翻看词典开始和结尾部分.

words.tran_cn: 结尾部分；终结句；尾声；终曲

trans.tran_cn: 乐章结尾部，完结部，终曲
trans.tran_en: an additional separate part at the end of a piece of music
